name: _id
description: The address of the smart contract.

name: deployTxHash
description: The deployTxHash holds the hex encoded hash of the transaction that deployed the smart contract.

name: deployer
description: The address in bech32 encoding of the smart contract deployer.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the smart contract was deployed.

name: upgrades

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp of the block in which the smart contract was upgraded.

fields.name: upgradeTxHash
fields.description: The hex encoded hash of the contract upgrade transaction.

fields.name: upgrader
fields.description: The bech32 encoded address of the sender of the contract upgrade transaction.

description: A list with details about the upgrades of the smart contract.
